kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '110'} body=b'{"nome": "ROBOT_ALTUALIZADO", "email": "robot@example.com", "password": "senharobot", "administrador": "true"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
